name: Oregonian
title: A Lineup Gamble A Coaching Handoff And Superb Defense 3 Things That Fueled Oregon State Baseballs College World Series Berth.html
content: College Football Beavers Schedule **A lineup gamble, a coaching handoff and superb defense: 3 things that fueled Oregon State baseball’s College World Series berth** Updated:Jun. 11, 2025, 8:34 a.m. |Published:Jun. 10, 2025, 1:12 p.m. Joe Freeman | The Oregonian/OregonLive The lineup thatlaunched the Oregon State baseball teaminto theCollege World Seriesbecame official less than an hour before the first pitch of Sunday’s win-or-go-home Game 3 at the Corvallis Super Regional. But, really, it materialized one night earlier.
